title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Heavy Division B78XH 0.1.8
description:
In this addon spotlight I will show you how you can use the enhancements made to Heavy Divisions B78XH mod which has been updated a few days ago to version 0.1.8. The developer team made some nice enhancements to the cockpit including updates to several displays and the VNAV options.

If you like to use the mod use link below to download it:

Heavy Division B78XH cockpit
https://github.com/Heavy-Division/B78XH
